html:
New iPad deals are in effect for March, with Apple's latest iPad mini 7 back down to its lowest $399 price as Amazon and Best Buy engage in a price war.

Nearly every iPad mini 7 is $100 off at Amazon and Best Buy, with iPad mini 7 prices starting at $399 after the discounts.

Buy from $399

You can pick up the 128GB Wi-Fi model for $399 with the triple-digit savings — and even higher capacity specs are eligible for limited-time deals.

iPad mini 7 models on sale

  • 128GB, WiFi: $399 ($100 off) at Amazon & Best Buy
  • 256GB, WiFi: $499 ($100 off) at Amazon & Best Buy
  • 512GB, WiFi: $699 ($100 off) at Amazon & Best Buy
  • 128GB, WiFi + Cellular: $549 ($100 off) at Best Buy
  • 256GB, WiFi + Cellular: $649 ($100 off) at Amazon & Best Buy
  • 512GB, WiFi + Cellular: $849 ($100 off) at Amazon & Best Buy

The iPad mini 7 was released in October 2024 and is compatible with the Apple Pencil Pro, which is currently on sale for $99 at Amazon. The iPad mini also sports Apple's A17 Pro chip and supports Wi-Fi 6E.

Amazon and Best Buy's $399 iPad mini promo provides the lowest price seen on the compact tablet. You can also find sale prices on Apple's M2 iPad Air and M4 iPad Pro models in our iPad Price Guide.
